column2: Alpha Black to Papa Bear. we're at the the town of Velps,, and have viewed it successfully. Over.
Papa Bear, this is Alpha Black. We have Objective Two, Vaals, in our glasses. Quite a few bad guys here. Over.
Alpha Black calling Papa Bear. We're at the extract location. Requesting pickup. Over.
Papa Bear to Alpha Black. Roger that. Out.
Papa Bear here, we copy you. Good work, Alpha. Out.
Acknowledged, mission complete. Extract is on it's way. This is Papa Bear, signing off.
Edwards, SEAL, at a SW Velp beach.
